setRandomSeed

public void setRandomSeed(long seed)
Description copied from class: Network
By setting the seed of the internal random generator, network address creation will follow a repeatable pattern.

Specified by:
setRandomSeed in class Network
Parameters:
seed - value of the seed to be used to establish the random sequence. Use 0 for random addresses.

replaceAddress

public NetAddress replaceAddress(NetAddress other)
Description copied from class: Network
Request the network implementation to replace an existing address with a fresh one. Intended to allow nodes to go offline and then return later with a new address.

Specified by:
replaceAddress in class Network
Parameters:
other - - the address being replaced.
Returns:
The replacement address.

Description copied from interface: Displayable
Draws the implementing object in a simulator internal frame/window.

Parameters:
gu - Unscaled graphics context of the internal frame/window.
gs - Scaled graphics context of the internal frame/window. Using this context, shapes are scaled according to a transformation applied to the frame/window.
